title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 531 - Compensating Use Tax
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 531 - Compensating Use Tax

State Regulations
§ 531.1 - Imposition of compensating use tax
§ 531.2 - Definitions
§ 531.3 - Basis of tax
§ 531.4 - Property used outside of State prior to use in New York
§ 531.5 - Exemptions from the compensating use tax
§ 531.6 - Reporting of sales and use tax by purchasers not required to file periodic returns

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 531

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 1110, 1111, 1116, 1118, 1133, 1142, 1250

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
